reviewText:
BUY BUY BUY
You can't go wrong with anything these people teach you, they are smart, honest, do not take ANY advertising just like consumer reports so you can trust their opinions are their opinions and not some paid sponsors.
It was a good buy I like it  thanks for the order and for having products like this for me to choose

I must admit I very disappoint with this purchase not with the program but all 4 DVD were corrupted I clean them and they still did play correctly, I put in another DVD and no problem. I'm just the kind of person who hates to sent stuff back but that me no fault of Amazon. I will still buy from Amazon what I could view from the DVD was great and I cook a couple of the recipes shown .
5 stars of course, for the service, the price as well as for the item itself. Will definitely be buying from this vender again in the future.
This is still one of the best cooking shows ever. It never gets old. I hope this show go's on for another 11 years!!!

I am a fading fan of the show, after 11 years it is getting old and repetitive. I do not think it is worth it anymore.
The format is getting stale and there are only so many ways that you can cook the same thing over and over again.
Also they are not showing the measurements for the recipes any more. You have to subscribe to their website to get the details. Overall it is not as good as it once was.
Positve note: DVD order was easy, smooth and no problems with delivery from Amazon and co.

Great DVD
As specified in the add
now i can clear many hours off my tivo, grin

I really love this TV show.  Now I can watch it whenever I want to.
I would recommend this product to everyone.

Have all the seasons and use them often.  My young grand daughter like to watch them also as she loves to help in the kitchen. The information is easy  to understand and money saving in most cases. Highly recommend.
Americas Test Kitchen is always guaranteed to satisfy!  My inner geek loves all the research that goes into developing the perfect recipe.  I bought this to complete my collection.
